bibl.title: Claiming the Stars. Egyptian Priests Facing the Sky.
Basel Egyptology Prize 1. Junior Research in Egyptian History, Archaeology, and Philology
bibl.author: DIELEMAN, Jacco

bibl.note: Astrology was absent in pharaonic Egypt. It is thus understandable to find Greek prayers or Greek glosses in Demotic texts from the Ptolemaic and the Roman periods, for instance O.D.N. I, 33 and P.G.M. II, XIV, 1-11. - Pp. 288-289: Bibliography.
bibl.seg: DIELEMAN Jacco, Claiming the Stars. Egyptian Priests Facing the Sky.
Susanne BICKEL and Antonio LOPRIENO (Edd.), Basel Egyptology Prize 1. Junior Research in Egyptian History, Archaeology, and Philology = Aegyptiaca Helvetica. 17 (Basel, 2003) pp. 277-289, 2 fac-sim.
